main event: A private citizen observed a shiny, metallic, spherical object drifting eastward over Upper Greenwood Lake, New Jersey, on August 13, 1952.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 25-30 seconds,The sighting is suspected to be a balloon observation,There was no additional information provided by the witness,No further investigations could confirm the origin of the object,The object appeared to have a shiny appearance and was moving in a defined course.
location: Upper Greenwood Lake, New Jersey, USA
